Class ContentPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • Insurance.Policy
      • Insurance.ContentPolicy

  • public class ContentPolicy
extends Policy
    Ashley Moore 19/02/2013 Contents Policy class which inherits the policy class and creates the content policy objects
